title: HiSET Essay 1
intro_text:
Writing, Part 2--Essay

Welcome to the Writing, Part 2--Essay Initial Practice Test!

This is a quick test to see how prepared you are for the Essay portion of the HiSET® Writing test. We'll use your results to help create your learning plan and make recommendations as you move through the course.

Take your time with this test and do your best to respond to the prompt. We will grade your response and give you feedback as quickly as possible, usually by the next day.

There is one prompt on the test. This test will give you practice with the type of essay you will see on the HiSET® test and help us generate a study plan for what you need to brush up on for the test.

Relax and do your best!
